title: Prostate cancer.
summary: Essential facts Prostate cancer is the most common cancer in men and makes up 26 per cent of all male cancer diagnoses in the UK. According to the charity Prostate Cancer UK, more than 40,000 men are diagnosed with the disease every year. â€¦
abstract: Essential facts Prostate cancer is the most common cancer in men and makes up 26 per cent of all male cancer diagnoses in the UK. According to the charity Prostate Cancer UK, more than 40,000 men are diagnosed with the disease every year. However, prostate cancer can be slow growing and many men have a cancer that will not cause them harm in their lifetime, says the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE).
